home.title: BEIT Expert Insights
home.subtitle: Green Building Knowledge for Mosul Trainers
home.heading: Ask the Experts
home.description: Query 40+ bilingual insights gathered from BEIT Architecture, Solar, and Insulation trainers to plan sessions, spot barriers, and source authentic quotes.
home.placeholder: Ask a question about training delivery, participant barriers, or curriculum tweaks...
home.aiToggleDisabled: Enable OpenAI API key or Ollama in Settings to use AI generation
home.loadingGeneratingSlow: Generating AI answer (this may take 2-5 minutes)...
home.ollamaReminder: Using Ollama for AI generation. Make sure Ollama is running locally with the required models.

aiWarning.title: AI generation will be very slow on local hardware
aiWarning.body: Without an OpenAI API key, answer generation may take 2-5 minutes depending on your computer resources. With a key, results arrive in 5-10 seconds.
aiWarning.tip: Add an OpenAI API key in Settings for faster answers, or uncheck "Generate AI Answer" for instant search results.

exampleQuestions: What hands-on activities worked best in training?
What barriers prevent graduates from finding work?
How should we balance theory vs practice?
What cultural barriers affect green building adoption in Mosul?
What market opportunities exist for solar energy?
Which certification approaches are most valued by employers?
home.failed: Failed to search. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyHelp: This key is stored only on your device and is used to generate faster AI answers.
settings.aiHelpBody: AI answer generation will be very slow on most local computers. Add an OpenAI API key to receive results within seconds.
settings.ollamaDescription: Run AI generation locally using Ollama instead of OpenAI API.
ollamaSteps: 1. Download and install Ollama from https://ollama.ai
3. Make sure Ollama is running (ollama serve)
